text: Map of diplomatic missions in Saint Lucia This is a list of diplomatic missions in Saint Lucia. At present, the country hosts 9 embassies/high commissions. Several other countries have honorary consuls to provide emergency services to their citizens. == Embassies/High Commissions == Castries * * * * * Gros Islet * * * * == Honorary Consulates == * * * * * * * * * * * == Non-resident embassies and high commissions == {| | * (Bridgetown) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Bogotá) * (Kingston) * (Bridgetown) * (Kingston) * (Port- of-Spain) * (Mexico City)http://www.mzv.cz/jnp/en/diplomatic_missions/czech_missions_abroad/saint_lucia_embassy_of_the_czech.html * (Mexico City) * (Bridgetown) * (Caracas) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Caracas)http://www.mfa.gr/en/greece-bilateral-relations/santa-lucia/santa- lucia--contact-details-for-greek-missions.html * (Port-of-Spain) * (Port-of- Spain) * (New York City) * (Caracas) * (New York City) * (Santo Domingo) * (Caracas) |valign=top| * (Port-of-Spain) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Panama City) * (Caracas) * (Miami) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Bridgetown) * (Bogotá) * (Bogotá) * (Bogotá) * (Caracas) * (Kingston) * (Havana) * (Kingston) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Stockholm) * (Caracas) * (Port-of-Spain) * (Bridgetown) |} ==See also== * Foreign relations of Saint Lucia * Visa requirements for Saint Lucian citizens ==References== Category:Foreign relations of Saint Lucia Saint Lucia Diplomatic missions Category:Lists of organisations based in Saint Lucia
